issue.title: www.canal13mexico.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.canal13mexico.com/portada-chiapas/en-vivo-senal-chiapas/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.canal13mexico.com%2Fportada-chiapas%2Fen-vivo-senal-chiapas%2F) ### Comment > uBlock Origin is detected due to this filter: > ||getadjacent.com^ > Found in this commit https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/1ca32cb5309898e94fc8b27088cb20cf381a925b > > Suggested filter: > ||getadjacent.com/amd/*/ned-adjacent-ads.min.js > Based on this commit https://github.com/easylist/easylistspanish/commit/b26d9879d340219bb12d5d89d267798298327720 > > Tracking filter: > ||cdn.s73cloud.com^ or ||cdn.s73cloud.com/4/s73-sdk-videojs.js > Blocking this script prevents many tracking requests to americas.s73cloud.com/metrics/v1 ### Screenshots

issue.title: novinky.cz - cookie popup
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

If you visit novinky.cz, popup saying "Abyste mohli pokračovat, potřebujeme vědět, jakou formou vám můžeme zobrazovat reklamu" (translated "In order for you to proceed, we need to know how we can show you advertising") will appear shortly after visiting the website.

### Proposed solution

I made filter for this (but it needs more testing, not sure, if it breaks something, it didn't break anything for me, but we canno be 100% sure)
```
||cmp.seznam.cz^$3p
```

### Additional information

This is also related to #177571

issue.title: novinky.cz - cookie popup
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

If you visit novinky.cz, popup saying "Abyste mohli pokračovat, potřebujeme vědět, jakou formou vám můžeme zobrazovat reklamu" (translated "In order for you to proceed, we need to know how we can show you advertising") will appear shortly after visiting the website.

### Proposed solution

I made filter for this (but it needs more testing, not sure, if it breaks something, it didn't break anything for me, but we cannot be 100% sure)
```
||cmp.seznam.cz^$3p
```

### Additional information

This is also related to #177571

comment.body:
Unfortunately, the proposed solution is not enough.
When you visit novinky.cz, the popup does not show, however it does show when you click on an article.
I'm not sure whether this can be bypassed, as the server returns 302:
![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/38181667/56a7494f-3c9b-4b56-baef-b493762b590a)
